TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 在 对象和 XML 文档之间进行序列化和反序列化操作。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes objects into and from XML documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 序列化是将对象的公共属性和字段转换为序列格式（这里是指 XML）以便存储或传输的过程。XML serialization is the process of converting an object's public properties and fields to a serial format (in this case, XML) for storage or transport. 反序列化则是从 XML 中重新创建原始状态的对象。Deserialization re-creates the object in its original state from the XML. 类可将 SAML 安全令牌序列化和反序列化，这些令牌具有可扩展格式。The class serializes and deserializes SAML security tokens, which have an extensible format. 和许多其他安全令牌不同， 安全令牌包括可按应用程序需要进行自定义的 XML 元素和属性。Unlike many other security tokens, security tokens include XML elements and attributes that can be customized for an application's needs. SAML 断言的部分可扩展点包括 ``、`` 和 `` 元素。Some of the extensibility points for a SAML assertion include the ``, ``, and `` elements. 有关重写这些元素的读取方式的详细信息，请参见 、 和 方法。For more details about overriding how each of these elements are read, see the , , and methods.

summary.span: 使用指定 XML 读取器读取 SAML 断言的 元素中 SAML 授权机构所提供的附加信息。

span.span: Reads the additional information provided by the SAML authority within a element of a SAML assertion using the specified XML reader.

span.span: A that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority within a element of a SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SAML 断言中的 `` 元素是 SAML 令牌的扩展点。The `` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens. 若要创建可读取自定义属性的序列化程序，请从 派生一个类，并重写 方法。To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from and override the method.

summary.span: 使用指定的 XML 阅读器读取 SAML 安全令牌主题的属性。

span.span: Reads an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token using the specified XML reader.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示一个声明，而该声明是 SAML 安全令牌主题的一个属性。

span.span: A that represents a claim that is an attribute of the subject of a SAML security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序定义自己的属性集（由于 SAML 属性是可扩展点，因此有这种可能），则需要一个知道如何读取这些属性的序列化程序。When an application defines its own set of attributes, which is possible because SAML attributes is an extensibility point, a serializer that understands how to read those attributes is needed. SAML 属性与 XML 属性不同。A SAML attribute is different than an XML attribute. SAML 属性包含在 `` 元素中，可以包含任何格式良好的 XML，而不仅仅是包含属性。A SAML attribute is contained within a `` element and can contain any well-formed XML, not just an attribute. 若要创建可读取自定义属性的序列化程序，请从 派生一个类，并重写 方法。To create a serializer that can read the custom attributes, derive a class from and override the method.

returns.span: 一个表示 SAML 语句的 。

span.span: A that represents the SAML statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，其中声明的详细信息在 SAML 语句中指定。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions where the details of the claims are specified in SAML statements. SAML 规范定义以下语句类型：The SAML specification defines the following statement types: - - - - 方法读取前面所列的 SAML 语句。The method reads the SAML statements listed previously. 如果应用程序定义并使用自定义语句，请创建一个序列化程序来读取它们的内容。When custom statements are defined and used by an application, create a serializer to read the contents of them. 若要创建自定义序列化程序，请从 派生一个类，并重写 方法。To create the custom serializer, derive a class from and override the method. 自定义 SAML 语句包含在 `` 元素中。Custom SAML statements are contained within a `` element. ## Examples

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public void PopulateDictionary (System.Xml.IXmlDictionary dictionary);
.method public hidebysig instance void PopulateDictionary(class System.Xml.IXmlDictionary dictionary) cil managed
Public Sub PopulateDictionary (dictionary As IXmlDictionary)
public: void PopulateDictionary(System::Xml::IXmlDictionary ^ dictionary);
member this.PopulateDictionary : System.Xml.IXmlDictionary -> unit

param.name: dictionary
param.span: 一个 ，包含 XML 元素和属性集。

span.span: An that contains the set of XML elements and attributes.

summary.span: 将此序列化程序能识别的 XML 元素和属性默认集替换为指定的元素和属性字典。

span.span: Replaces the default set of XML elements and attributes that are recognized by this serializer with the specified dictionary of elements and attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为 SAML 断言的可扩展点之一定义了 XML 元素的自定义集，请使用 方法。Use the method when a custom set of XML elements is defined for one of the extensibility points of a SAML assertion. SAML 断言的可扩展点包括 ``、`` 和 `` 元素。Extensibility points for a SAML assertion include the ``, ``, and `` elements. 有关重写这些元素的读取方式的详细信息，请参见 、 和 方法。For more details about overriding how each of these elements are read, see the , , and methods.
